i:view.i:title: Help Settings

i:field.name: opt0
i:field.label: No help
i:field.i:comment: Help text shouldn't be displayed at all

i:field.name: opt1
i:field.label: Comment
i:field.i:comment: Help text is displayed like this

i:field.name: opt2
i:field.label: Inline
i:field.i:comment: Help text should be displayed inline, next to label with icon tip

i:field.name: popup
i:field.label: Popup
i:field.i:comment: Enables / disables help popup window, which contains help for each form field and the widget description

i:field.name: widgethelp
i:field.label: Widget help
i:field.i:comment: Enables / Disables widget description at the top of each wiget

i:view.i:description: This widget allows you to define how widget help should be rendered. It is also possible to disable the help system using the first option.
